author: David McKeen
comment: Pro unlock didn't do anything for me either.

reply.author: Florian DUHEN
reply.content:
Hello, sorry to hear that. 
Please note that the "pro" version is a different app,  it won't unlock the features in the Free version.
After buying and downloading the pro version, you will see in the Android Wear app (on your phone) the Watchface "Furious Pro".
If you need more support, please contact me directly at xerib59@gmail.com

author: Tracy Jones
comment: I paid the Pro fee, installed app, but didn't see app transfer to my Gear or watchface category. Please help. Even uninstalled app and tried again. Nothing negative about your app, just need a little bit assistance. Will support anyone with a clever idea such as this...thanks for any help.
title: Not happy...yet

author: Anil Nirwan
comment: Eat well by the end of the month. You forced my hand here to pay. It's so freaking cool. Thank you.

reply.author: Florian DUHEN
reply.content:
Hey mate ! 
Thank you for your review, really appreciate it. I can finally buy some rice to survive until next month.

title: Brother.

author: Glenndy Dionysis
comment: You want it, you just do....
title: Great

author: Wardell Bagby
comment: If you could add the ability to add/remove/edit the custom insults, that would be sooooo nice. That being said, this is still wonderful and I'd pay more if I could.
title: Love it but wish there were more features.

author: Rick Katribe
comment: OK, after loading the free version, I had to spring for the Pro version. I still love the concept: a watch face with attitude.   I'd give it five stars if there were a way to tone down the language a bit. I have to be careful who I show this to!

author: K law
comment: My fav face to show off
